pageContext.desc: Civil War officer with the 2nd Iowa Infantry and commander of the 47th Colored Infantry Regiment.
transcription:
January, Thursday, 1. 1863.
Pleasant day - Spent in the office in Moscow - Nothing new of any kind
pageContext.category: Diaries; American Civil War (1861-1865); Family papers
pageContext.title: Hiram Scofield diary, 1863
